scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html build/ && copyfiles data/**/*.json build/ copyfiles data/**/*.png build/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/public/* build
scripts.build: rm -rf build && tsc && yarn minify && yarn copy-files
scripts.test: tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && cd .test && node tests/main.js && cd .. && rm -rf .test
